pages.text: The $(9)$(l:items/ar_goggles)AR Goggles$(/l)$() can be used in combination with the $(9)$(l:peripherals/inventory_manager)Inventory Manager$(/l)$() to communicate with the player's inventory.$(p)Right click with the Memory Card in hand to assign it to yourself.$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/items/ar_goggles/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!
